definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to the Pharisees .
Emphasizing the observance of ritual or practice over the meaning.
Involving the total excision of the foreskin ( posthetomy ), including all or most of the penile frenulum , in addition to milah , periah , and occasionally metzitza .

main_definition: Of or pertaining to the Pharisees .
secondary_definitions: ( chiefly Christianity ) Emphasizing the observance of ritual or practice over the meaning.
( of circumcision ) Involving the total excision of the foreskin ( posthetomy ), including all or most of the penile frenulum , in addition to milah , periah , and occasionally metzitza .
